You can get 3.03 OE-C from psp-hacks.com

just go to downloads/firmware/and try to find the easy download version, cause it really is way easier.

If your psp isn't in version 1.50 then you will need to downgrade to it, just hope you have 3.03 or less.

For downgrading help go to the forums page, then tutorials on psp-hacks.com
